title: Remember normal? Pfizer and BioNTech join with health groups to remind us—and promote COVID-19 vaccine safety
author: Sharon Klahr Coey
description: Remember hugging, playing with grandchildren, kissing people goodbye and sharing exciting news with family in person? | Hugging, playing with a grandchild, kissing people goodbye, sharing exciting news with family—in person, these are some of the things COVID-19 has curtailed. Pfizer and BioNTech, together with a coalition of health organizations, have launched a vaccine awareness campaign featuring these events aimed at shoring up confidence in the new COVID-19 vaccines.
